content: this pattern is available for free on my blog https //www windingroadcrochet com/woven-cowl-free-crochet-pattern/ or you can purchase the pdf pattern above to have a neat clean printer friendly version of the pattern the pattern is written in english using us terms pattern level beginner this pattern uses the chain single_crochet half_double_crochet working in the back loops only and working into the side of a stitch materials needed 1-2 skeins super bulky size 6 yarn size m/n 9mm crochet hook yarn needle and scissors this cowl looks a lot more complicated than it is i have provided a photo tutorial to help with the process child 5 inches wide by 17 inches circumference adult 6 5 inches wide by 20 inches in circumference this listing is for a pdf pattern instant download not a finished product please make sure to download adobe reader at www adobe com if you do not already have it on your computer copyright ©2019 winding road crochet purchaser is not allowed to copy sell or reproduce this pattern in any way because this is a digital product there will be not refunds after purchase
